snippet: A few of the thousands of young women from the minority Yazidi religion who were kidnapped by the Islamic State told of a systemized industry of slavery.
abstract: Five young Yazidi women, who were kidnapped in Iraq by Islamic State's fighters, share harrowing story of systematic slavery and abuse; several thousand women have been abducted in the region and made to submit to forced marriages, religious conversion and rape; few have escaped.
lead_paragraph: A few of the thousands of young women from the minority Yazidi religion who were kidnapped by the Islamic State told of a systemized industry of slavery.
